review_text: Thanks Phil!
Moving from Sony Vegas Pro 15 to Premiere Pro and this course helped out a lot as it is surprisingly different. Would recommend Phil. Easy to follow and very concise
Good course for video editing not just for this software, but video editing in general.  Good work, sir.  Best video I've seen yet.
Thank you , interesting course
Excellent tutorials and fundamentals are covered in depth.  Projects and samples provided are very useful
Best course. Actually I am beginning to understand a lot of things which I didn't know before.
A great course indeed.

I have learned a lot from youtube, this course is made for people who just started video editing. Since I am not a pro, but a learner, I loved only  3 parts of course. 
Exporting
Colour correction
And sound design. 

If u know those things very well, this isn't a course for you.
great for starters
Best Learning Platform  Ever . I have learn the this course form different platform before i just started to just check the course but i find many thing is this course which i haven't know about them
AWESOME! So glad I took this course.
Great course, I really learned a lot about editing in Premiere Pro.
Great introduction in video editing!
One of the best course with the best instructors. Told everything in super detail.
it was a great course, thanks to Phil I learned a lot

It was a great course!
I've learned a lot of new things, specially in color grading and audio editing section.
Great videos for learning from 0.
Great and informative course for fundamentals.
Good course!
Great Course. Best for all types of students, from beginners to experts, has a lot of things to learn.

Covered a lot of stuff, so if I was a complete beginner 5/5.

However:

1) WHY are you forcing me to watch EVERYTHING before I go to the next chapter!? I learned a lot, but knew AT LEAST 50% of the stuff. So midway I tried skipping what I know, but I couldn't because everything is a prerequisite. WHY??? Is this an intentional decision done so that people cannot refund by saying: "Well you watched everything so you can't refund. :)"?

2) Very uneven exercise difficulty. Some take 1-5min. While other's *cough* audio exercise *cough* are literally impossible. Also, I don't remember master clip being mentioned anywhere, despite it being so useful.

Other than that it's good stuff.
Great course. Would totally recommend.
I learned premiere without a course. But after working with it for a while I wanted to learn it more professional. This course is really good. It explains everything pretty well. Thank you.
Nice and get huge
the perfect course for me. thank you very much!!

Despite the fact that I have 9 years of experience in video editing, I still learned some small tips and little features I've never used before.
It's a great course especially for beginners, for me personally it was nice to just see how another skilled editor does the operations that I do.
Thank you Phil.üòÅ
